verbs.description: i [V: ’m] going to efcc with my bedclothes pillowcase bible – fayose i will be there on tuesday i am not begging for any bail it is up to them if they want me they should just give me a bed i have done by bed bedclothes i have done my pillowcase i have my english and yoruba bibles fayose told reporters in abuja musiliu obanikoro nsa ayodele fayose senator musiliu obanikoro sahara reporters efcc africa economic and financial crimes commission national security adviser ayo fayose
